titleStmt.title: A satyr against brandy. Written by Jo. Hains, as he saith himself.
titleStmt.author: Haines, Joseph, d. 1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Jos. Hindmarsh at the Black-Bull in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Farewell damn'd Stygian juice, who dost bewitch ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
